property.value: [1.0.5] Add help link [1.0.4] Update online update location [1.0.3] Minor typo [1.0.2] Don't throw as many data-missing dialogs [1.0.1] Sort out Dave's dragging problem when only blue produces update.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.name
property.value: Narrative Viewer Plug-in

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Name: Narrative Viewer Plug-in Bundle-Version: 1.0.9 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.eclipse.ui,org.mwc.cmap.core,org.mwc.cmap.legacy Eclipse-LazyStart: true Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.cmap.NarrativeViewer;singleton:=true Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Vendor: borlander@gmail.com Bundle-Activator: org.mwc.cmap.NarrativeViewer.app.Activator

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.9] Make sure tall (multi-line) entry is fully visible [1.0.8] Refactor narrative provider [1.0.7] Let time get updated asyncronously [1.0.6] Only select entry that's visible [1.0.5] Add help link [1.0.4] Integrate with time [1.0.3] Hide visible column by default [1.0.2] Include checkbox for entry visible [1.0.1] Initial integrated implemenatation

property.value: [1.0.10] Catch intermittent error on load of new plot [1.0.9] Amend online update location [1.0.8] Ensure write-WMF finishes, improve error reporting [1.0.7] Improve clipping for wrapped bearing points [1.0.6] Better time steps, 30 deg axis steps, remove print button [1.0.5] Adjust plot formatting tick units [1.0.4] Fix bug where menu never shown [1.0.3] Use tidy icon for XYPlot [1.0.2] Sort out xyplot Manifest [1.0.1] Preps for RC1

property.value: [1.0.9] Add help link [1.0.8] Amend online update location [1.0.7] Fix minor auto-generate problem [1.0.6] Handle tote items being removed from layer manager [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.4] Add user-selectable slant-range property [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.2] Incorporate removing primary/secondary tracks

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.23] Continue bislider management [1.0.22] Better bislider management [1.0.21] Remember the bi-slider values [1.0.20] Fix the fix [1.0.19] Improve detailed edit of start/end times [1.0.18]Switch icon to more intuitive one [1.0.17] Ditch the preferences pages, we don't need them. [1.0.16] Make sure we finish step tidily, even if probs occur. Then we will carry on stepping [1.0.15] More robust checking for gui elements disposed [1.0.14] More error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.13] Error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.12] Fix edit prop's not being displayed, better default DTG format [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Lots of tidying, introduce highlighters [1.0.9] Redraw whole plot when switching out of relative mode [1.0.8] Include debug monitoring of steps [1.0.7] Allow stepper to work even when outside visible time period [1.0.6] Investigate when time stepper fails [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.3] Preps for RC5 [1.0.2] Remove junit dependency CMAP Time Controller This view controls the time for temporal datasets. Buttons are provided for forward and backward travel, as is a time-slider. The time-format used to display the current date-time is configurable via the Windows-Preferences dialog.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement[1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.21] Fix for supporting multiple mouse position trackers [1.0.20] Allow us to not perform zoom when data border is set - if we don't want to [1.0.19] Improved performance of plotting very long tracks [1.0.18] Persist value of last measured range/bearing [1.0.17] Show two decimal places for measured range bearing [1.0.16] More prevention of tripping when erasing canvas [1.0.15] Fix for crashing in dragged snail-trail [1.0.14] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers [1.0.13] Update should redraw whole plot, not just repaint it [1.0.12] Ensure we ditch GCs we no longer need [1.0.11] Fix integration issue associated with buffer clearing [1.0.10] Try to diagnose buffer clearing troubles [1.0.9] Improve double-buffer management [1.0.8] Fix display of bearing in Rng-Brg measurer [1.0.7] Preps for final release [1.0.6] Support for overview chart [1.0.5] Preps for RC5 [1.0.4] Don't allow save of REP files [1.0.3] Implement correct save-as function [1.0.2] Keep track of file clean/dirty status [1.0.1] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting

property.value: [1.0.13] Improve context-sensitive help [1.0.12] Correct label for sync with plot [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Sort tactical items by DTG, others by name [1.0.9] Sort layer manager items alphabetically [1.0.8] Tidily fall-over when LayerMgr does not have trackDataListener [1.0.7] Update build [1.0.6] Release preps [1.0.5] Double-click to open item in props window [1.0.4] Context-sensitive primary & secondary buttons [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.1] Provide management of primary/secondary tracks

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.21] Fix for supporting multiple mouse position trackers [1.0.20] Allow us to not perform zoom when data border is set - if we don't want to [1.0.19] Improved performance of plotting very long tracks [1.0.18] Persist value of last measured range/bearing [1.0.17] Show two decimal places for measured range bearing [1.0.16] More prevention of tripping when erasing canvas [1.0.15] Fix for crashing in dragged snail-trail [1.0.14] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers [1.0.13] Update should redraw whole plot, not just repaint it [1.0.12] Ensure we ditch GCs we no longer need [1.0.11] Fix integration issue associated with buffer clearing [1.0.10] Try to diagnose buffer clearing troubles [1.0.9] Improve double-buffer management [1.0.8] Fix display of bearing in Rng-Brg measurer [1.0.7] Preps for final release [1.0.6] Support for overview chart [1.0.5] Preps for RC5 [1.0.4] Don't allow save of REP files [1.0.3] Implement correct save-as function [1.0.2] Keep track of file clean/dirty status [1.0.1] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.13] Improve context-sensitive help [1.0.12] Correct label for sync with plot [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Sort tactical items by DTG, others by name [1.0.9] Sort layer manager items alphabetically [1.0.8] Tidily fall-over when LayerMgr does not have trackDataListener [1.0.7] Update build [1.0.6] Release preps [1.0.5] Double-click to open item in props window [1.0.4] Context-sensitive primary & secondary buttons [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.1] Provide management of primary/secondary tracks

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement[1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.name
property.value: Legacy Plug-in

instructions.instruction: Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Localization: plugin Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.debrief.legacy Bundle-Vendor: MWC Bundle-Name: Legacy Plug-in Bundle-ClassPath: debrief_legacy.jar, libs/jcommon-0.7.1.jar Bundle-Version: 1.0.57 Require-Bundle: org.mwc.cmap.legacy, org.junit

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.66] Better tooltip detection of current bearing line [1.0.65] Plot TUAs & Bearing before track in TrackWrapper - since large volume of bearings was hiding track [1.0.64] Store & use line thickness for annotations [1.0.63] Store & use slider start/end settings when reopening file [1.0.62] Fix for time threshold around text label in Snail [1.0.61] Fix time stepper not moving forward [1.0.60] More robust string retrieval for ShapeWrapper in Snail [1.0.59] Let shape wrapper have their own width, take Two. [1.0.58] Let shape wrapper have their own width [1.0.57] Don't show snail highlight for labels [1.0.56] Support dtf file suffix for REP data [1.0.55] Force update, to include: store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.54] Store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.53] Update to include new narrative column sequence/format [1.0.52] Update perspective to exploit new narrative viewer [1.0.51] Switch column sequence of Narrative2 data format [1.0.49] Optimised plotting of monster tracks [1.0.48] Fix copying sensor/track data to clipboard [1.0.47] More robust handling of errors in Replay import [1.0.46] Allow user to hide line connecting points [1.0.45] Show fixwrapper hover in correct units [1.0.44] Force inclusion of previous update [1.0.42] Force file refresh before opening, tidy generics support [1.0.41] Tidily handle user cancelling Add Shape dialog [1.0.40] Update legacy unit tests [1.0.39] Reflect improved performance of export to clipboard [1.0.38] Hide S57 support, leading to instability [1.0.37] Robustly handle failure when can't see S57 exporter [1.0.36] Include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.35] Prevent highlight showing for sensor & TMA data. [1.0.34] Remove debug lines. [1.0.33] Force update. [1.0.32] Include debug code to analyse highlighter problem. [1.0.31] Make sure we include legacy code [1.0.30] Correct how buoy patterns presented with normal highlighter [1.0.29] Correct label used for user-controlled tgt layer select [1.0.28] Prevent lat/long indicator dissappearing when last editor is closed [1.0.27] Amend online update location [1.0.26] Set default layer painter/highlighter, change tactical font size to 9 px [1.0.25] Lots of tidying, esp to highlighters, snails, etc. [1.0.24] Improve Welcome structure - direct link to composite "getting started" [1.0.23] Fix problem related to return of series of positions within Track [1.0.22] Tidy up properly after dragging [1.0.21] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.20] Amend track manipulation such that point on or after requested DTG is returned (not on or before), to improve "5 min labels" when points don't all land on minute. [1.0.19] Fix new plot wizard [1.0.18] Allow user to set line-style for shapes [1.0.17] Improve value used for bearing-related wrapped points plotted at extremity [1.0.16] Improve plot redraw error trapping [1.0.15] Fix bug related to plotting zero-length labels [1.0.14] Ensure legacy fixes incorporated [1.0.12] Allow drag-drop of dsf files [1.0.11] Legacy fixes for save to file problem [1.0.10] Preps for final release [1.0.9] Remove view 3d button [1.0.8] Preps for RC1 [1.0.7] Add more creator buttons [1.0.7] Implement file-save [1.0.5] Add more supporting libraries [1.0.3] Add Debrief icons [1.0.2] Include more supporting libraries [1.0.1] Core Debrief viewer, able to import REP & Debrief XML files

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.10] Catch intermittent error on load of new plot [1.0.9] Amend online update location [1.0.8] Ensure write-WMF finishes, improve error reporting [1.0.7] Improve clipping for wrapped bearing points [1.0.6] Better time steps, 30 deg axis steps, remove print button [1.0.5] Adjust plot formatting tick units [1.0.4] Fix bug where menu never shown [1.0.3] Use tidy icon for XYPlot [1.0.2] Sort out xyplot Manifest [1.0.1] Preps for RC1

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.23] Continue bislider management [1.0.22] Better bislider management [1.0.21] Remember the bi-slider values [1.0.20] Fix the fix [1.0.19] Improve detailed edit of start/end times [1.0.18]Switch icon to more intuitive one [1.0.17] Ditch the preferences pages, we don't need them. [1.0.16] Make sure we finish step tidily, even if probs occur. Then we will carry on stepping [1.0.15] More robust checking for gui elements disposed [1.0.14] More error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.13] Error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.12] Fix edit prop's not being displayed, better default DTG format [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Lots of tidying, introduce highlighters [1.0.9] Redraw whole plot when switching out of relative mode [1.0.8] Include debug monitoring of steps [1.0.7] Allow stepper to work even when outside visible time period [1.0.6] Investigate when time stepper fails [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.3] Preps for RC5 [1.0.2] Remove junit dependency CMAP Time Controller This view controls the time for temporal datasets. Buttons are provided for forward and backward travel, as is a time-slider. The time-format used to display the current date-time is configurable via the Windows-Preferences dialog.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.name
property.value: Debrief Core

instructions.instruction: Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Activator: org.mwc.debrief.core.DebriefPlugin Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Localization: plugin Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.debrief.core; singleton:=true Bundle-Vendor: MWC Bundle-Name: Debrief Core Bundle-ClassPath: debrief_core.jar Bundle-Version: 1.0.52 Eclipse-LazyStart: true Require-Bundle: org.mwc.cmap.core, org.eclipse.ui, org.eclipse.core.runtime, org.mwc.cmap.plotViewer, org.mwc.cmap.legacy, org.mwc.debrief.legacy, org.eclipse.core.resources, org.eclipse.ui.ide, org.eclipse.ui.cheatsheets, org.eclipse.ui.intro, org.eclipse.platform, org.eclipse.core.filesystem, org.eclipse.ui.intro.universal

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.66] Better tooltip detection of current bearing line [1.0.65] Plot TUAs & Bearing before track in TrackWrapper - since large volume of bearings was hiding track [1.0.64] Store & use line thickness for annotations [1.0.63] Store & use slider start/end settings when reopening file [1.0.62] Fix for time threshold around text label in Snail [1.0.61] Fix time stepper not moving forward [1.0.60] More robust string retrieval for ShapeWrapper in Snail [1.0.59] Let shape wrapper have their own width, take Two. [1.0.58] Let shape wrapper have their own width [1.0.57] Don't show snail highlight for labels [1.0.56] Support dtf file suffix for REP data [1.0.55] Force update, to include: store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.54] Store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.53] Update to include new narrative column sequence/format [1.0.52] Update perspective to exploit new narrative viewer [1.0.51] Switch column sequence of Narrative2 data format [1.0.49] Optimised plotting of monster tracks [1.0.48] Fix copying sensor/track data to clipboard [1.0.47] More robust handling of errors in Replay import [1.0.46] Allow user to hide line connecting points [1.0.45] Show fixwrapper hover in correct units [1.0.44] Force inclusion of previous update [1.0.42] Force file refresh before opening, tidy generics support [1.0.41] Tidily handle user cancelling Add Shape dialog [1.0.40] Update legacy unit tests [1.0.39] Reflect improved performance of export to clipboard [1.0.38] Hide S57 support, leading to instability [1.0.37] Robustly handle failure when can't see S57 exporter [1.0.36] Include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.35] Prevent highlight showing for sensor & TMA data. [1.0.34] Remove debug lines. [1.0.33] Force update. [1.0.32] Include debug code to analyse highlighter problem. [1.0.31] Make sure we include legacy code [1.0.30] Correct how buoy patterns presented with normal highlighter [1.0.29] Correct label used for user-controlled tgt layer select [1.0.28] Prevent lat/long indicator dissappearing when last editor is closed [1.0.27] Amend online update location [1.0.26] Set default layer painter/highlighter, change tactical font size to 9 px [1.0.25] Lots of tidying, esp to highlighters, snails, etc. [1.0.24] Improve Welcome structure - direct link to composite "getting started" [1.0.23] Fix problem related to return of series of positions within Track [1.0.22] Tidy up properly after dragging [1.0.21] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.20] Amend track manipulation such that point on or after requested DTG is returned (not on or before), to improve "5 min labels" when points don't all land on minute. [1.0.19] Fix new plot wizard [1.0.18] Allow user to set line-style for shapes [1.0.17] Improve value used for bearing-related wrapped points plotted at extremity [1.0.16] Improve plot redraw error trapping [1.0.15] Fix bug related to plotting zero-length labels [1.0.14] Ensure legacy fixes incorporated [1.0.12] Allow drag-drop of dsf files [1.0.11] Legacy fixes for save to file problem [1.0.10] Preps for final release [1.0.9] Remove view 3d button [1.0.8] Preps for RC1 [1.0.7] Add more creator buttons [1.0.7] Implement file-save [1.0.5] Add more supporting libraries [1.0.3] Add Debrief icons [1.0.2] Include more supporting libraries [1.0.1] Core Debrief viewer, able to import REP & Debrief XML files

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.65] Fix minor null pointer bug encountered in lat long display code. [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement [1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.76] Force inclusion of sdk plugin (to allow classic updates) [1.0.75] Ditch old track representation [1.0.74] Handle TMA & Sensor tracks with identical names [1.0.73] More robust file-save across network shares (including extra directory refresh) [1.0.72] More robust file-save [1.0.71] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.70] Arbitrary build [1.0.69] Let user select new target layer [1.0.68] Provide support for 4W grids [1.0.67] Switch Debrief legacy project to using OSGI manifest [1.0.66] Better tooltip detection of current bearing line [1.0.65] Plot TUAs & Bearing before track in TrackWrapper - since large volume of bearings was hiding track [1.0.64] Store & use line thickness for annotations [1.0.63] Store & use slider start/end settings when reopening file [1.0.62] Fix for time threshold around text label in Snail [1.0.61] Fix time stepper not moving forward [1.0.60] More robust string retrieval for ShapeWrapper in Snail [1.0.59] Let shape wrapper have their own width, take Two. [1.0.58] Let shape wrapper have their own width [1.0.57] Don't show snail highlight for labels [1.0.56] Support dtf file suffix for REP data [1.0.55] Force update, to include: store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.54] Store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.53] Update to include new narrative column sequence/format [1.0.52] Update perspective to exploit new narrative viewer [1.0.51] Switch column sequence of Narrative2 data format [1.0.49] Optimised plotting of monster tracks [1.0.48] Fix copying sensor/track data to clipboard [1.0.47] More robust handling of errors in Replay import [1.0.46] Allow user to hide line connecting points [1.0.45] Show fixwrapper hover in correct units [1.0.44] Force inclusion of previous update [1.0.42] Force file refresh before opening, tidy generics support [1.0.41] Tidily handle user cancelling Add Shape dialog [1.0.40] Update legacy unit tests [1.0.39] Reflect improved performance of export to clipboard [1.0.38] Hide S57 support, leading to instability [1.0.37] Robustly handle failure when can't see S57 exporter [1.0.36] Include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.35] Prevent highlight showing for sensor & TMA data. [1.0.34] Remove debug lines. [1.0.33] Force update. [1.0.32] Include debug code to analyse highlighter problem. [1.0.31] Make sure we include legacy code [1.0.30] Correct how buoy patterns presented with normal highlighter [1.0.29] Correct label used for user-controlled tgt layer select [1.0.28] Prevent lat/long indicator dissappearing when last editor is closed [1.0.27] Amend online update location [1.0.26] Set default layer painter/highlighter, change tactical font size to 9 px [1.0.25] Lots of tidying, esp to highlighters, snails, etc. [1.0.24] Improve Welcome structure - direct link to composite "getting started" [1.0.23] Fix problem related to return of series of positions within Track [1.0.22] Tidy up properly after dragging [1.0.21] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.20] Amend track manipulation such that point on or after requested DTG is returned (not on or before), to improve "5 min labels" when points don't all land on minute. [1.0.19] Fix new plot wizard [1.0.18] Allow user to set line-style for shapes [1.0.17] Improve value used for bearing-related wrapped points plotted at extremity [1.0.16] Improve plot redraw error trapping [1.0.15] Fix bug related to plotting zero-length labels [1.0.14] Ensure legacy fixes incorporated [1.0.12] Allow drag-drop of dsf files [1.0.11] Legacy fixes for save to file problem [1.0.10] Preps for final release [1.0.9] Remove view 3d button [1.0.8] Preps for RC1 [1.0.7] Add more creator buttons [1.0.7] Implement file-save [1.0.5] Add more supporting libraries [1.0.3] Add Debrief icons [1.0.2] Include more supporting libraries [1.0.1] Core Debrief viewer, able to import REP & Debrief XML files

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.76] Force inclusion of sdk plugin (to allow classic updates) [1.0.75] Ditch old track representation [1.0.74] Handle TMA & Sensor tracks with identical names [1.0.73] More robust file-save across network shares (including extra directory refresh) [1.0.72] More robust file-save [1.0.71] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.70] Arbitrary build [1.0.69] Let user select new target layer [1.0.68] Provide support for 4W grids [1.0.67] Switch Debrief legacy project to using OSGI manifest [1.0.66] Better tooltip detection of current bearing line [1.0.65] Plot TUAs & Bearing before track in TrackWrapper - since large volume of bearings was hiding track [1.0.64] Store & use line thickness for annotations [1.0.63] Store & use slider start/end settings when reopening file [1.0.62] Fix for time threshold around text label in Snail [1.0.61] Fix time stepper not moving forward [1.0.60] More robust string retrieval for ShapeWrapper in Snail [1.0.59] Let shape wrapper have their own width, take Two. [1.0.58] Let shape wrapper have their own width [1.0.57] Don't show snail highlight for labels [1.0.56] Support dtf file suffix for REP data [1.0.55] Force update, to include: store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.54] Store narrative type entries, if available [1.0.53] Update to include new narrative column sequence/format [1.0.52] Update perspective to exploit new narrative viewer [1.0.51] Switch column sequence of Narrative2 data format [1.0.49] Optimised plotting of monster tracks [1.0.48] Fix copying sensor/track data to clipboard [1.0.47] More robust handling of errors in Replay import [1.0.46] Allow user to hide line connecting points [1.0.45] Show fixwrapper hover in correct units [1.0.44] Force inclusion of previous update [1.0.42] Force file refresh before opening, tidy generics support [1.0.41] Tidily handle user cancelling Add Shape dialog [1.0.40] Update legacy unit tests [1.0.39] Reflect improved performance of export to clipboard [1.0.38] Hide S57 support, leading to instability [1.0.37] Robustly handle failure when can't see S57 exporter [1.0.36] Include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.35] Prevent highlight showing for sensor & TMA data. [1.0.34] Remove debug lines. [1.0.33] Force update. [1.0.32] Include debug code to analyse highlighter problem. [1.0.31] Make sure we include legacy code [1.0.30] Correct how buoy patterns presented with normal highlighter [1.0.29] Correct label used for user-controlled tgt layer select [1.0.28] Prevent lat/long indicator dissappearing when last editor is closed [1.0.27] Amend online update location [1.0.26] Set default layer painter/highlighter, change tactical font size to 9 px [1.0.25] Lots of tidying, esp to highlighters, snails, etc. [1.0.24] Improve Welcome structure - direct link to composite "getting started" [1.0.23] Fix problem related to return of series of positions within Track [1.0.22] Tidy up properly after dragging [1.0.21] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.20] Amend track manipulation such that point on or after requested DTG is returned (not on or before), to improve "5 min labels" when points don't all land on minute. [1.0.19] Fix new plot wizard [1.0.18] Allow user to set line-style for shapes [1.0.17] Improve value used for bearing-related wrapped points plotted at extremity [1.0.16] Improve plot redraw error trapping [1.0.15] Fix bug related to plotting zero-length labels [1.0.14] Ensure legacy fixes incorporated [1.0.12] Allow drag-drop of dsf files [1.0.11] Legacy fixes for save to file problem [1.0.10] Preps for final release [1.0.9] Remove view 3d button [1.0.8] Preps for RC1 [1.0.7] Add more creator buttons [1.0.7] Implement file-save [1.0.5] Add more supporting libraries [1.0.3] Add Debrief icons [1.0.2] Include more supporting libraries [1.0.1] Core Debrief viewer, able to import REP & Debrief XML files

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.23] Prevent null-pointer exception when closing [1.0.22] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.21] Fix for supporting multiple mouse position trackers [1.0.20] Allow us to not perform zoom when data border is set - if we don't want to [1.0.19] Improved performance of plotting very long tracks [1.0.18] Persist value of last measured range/bearing [1.0.17] Show two decimal places for measured range bearing [1.0.16] More prevention of tripping when erasing canvas [1.0.15] Fix for crashing in dragged snail-trail [1.0.14] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers [1.0.13] Update should redraw whole plot, not just repaint it [1.0.12] Ensure we ditch GCs we no longer need [1.0.11] Fix integration issue associated with buffer clearing [1.0.10] Try to diagnose buffer clearing troubles [1.0.9] Improve double-buffer management [1.0.8] Fix display of bearing in Rng-Brg measurer [1.0.7] Preps for final release [1.0.6] Support for overview chart [1.0.5] Preps for RC5 [1.0.4] Don't allow save of REP files [1.0.3] Implement correct save-as function [1.0.2] Keep track of file clean/dirty status [1.0.1] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.23] Prevent null-pointer exception when closing [1.0.22] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.21] Fix for supporting multiple mouse position trackers [1.0.20] Allow us to not perform zoom when data border is set - if we don't want to [1.0.19] Improved performance of plotting very long tracks [1.0.18] Persist value of last measured range/bearing [1.0.17] Show two decimal places for measured range bearing [1.0.16] More prevention of tripping when erasing canvas [1.0.15] Fix for crashing in dragged snail-trail [1.0.14] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers [1.0.13] Update should redraw whole plot, not just repaint it [1.0.12] Ensure we ditch GCs we no longer need [1.0.11] Fix integration issue associated with buffer clearing [1.0.10] Try to diagnose buffer clearing troubles [1.0.9] Improve double-buffer management [1.0.8] Fix display of bearing in Rng-Brg measurer [1.0.7] Preps for final release [1.0.6] Support for overview chart [1.0.5] Preps for RC5 [1.0.4] Don't allow save of REP files [1.0.3] Implement correct save-as function [1.0.2] Keep track of file clean/dirty status [1.0.1] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.mwc.cmap.legacy,org.mwc.cmap.core,org.mwc.debrief.legacy,org.mwc.cmap.TimeController,org.eclipse.ui.views,org.mwc.cmap.plotViewer Bundle-Activator: org.mwc.cmap.plot3d.Plot3dPlugin Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 1.0.10 Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.cmap.plot3d;singleton:=true Bundle-ClassPath: Plot3d.jar Bundle-Name: 3D View Bundle-Vendor: MWC Eclipse-LazyStart: true

property.value: [1.0.10] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.9] Don't include so many jars (they should be in the JRE) [1.0.8] Add help link [1.0.7] Amend online update location [1.0.6] Preps for final release [1.0.4] Include debug lines

property.value: [1.0.6] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.5] Add help link [1.0.4] Update online update location [1.0.3] Minor typo [1.0.2] Don't throw as many data-missing dialogs [1.0.1] Sort out Dave's dragging problem when only blue produces update.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.16] Don't put shapes into Tote [1.0.15] Fix cutting layers [1.0.14] Fix generics-related warnings [1.0.13] Improve context-sensitive help [1.0.12] Correct label for sync with plot [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Sort tactical items by DTG, others by name [1.0.9] Sort layer manager items alphabetically [1.0.8] Tidily fall-over when LayerMgr does not have trackDataListener [1.0.7] Update build [1.0.6] Release preps [1.0.5] Double-click to open item in props window [1.0.4] Context-sensitive primary & secondary buttons [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.1] Provide management of primary/secondary tracks

instructions.instruction: Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Activator: org.mwc.cmap.core.CorePlugin Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Bundle-Localization: plugin Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.cmap.core; singleton:=true Bundle-Vendor: MWC Bundle-Name: CMap Core Resources Plug-in Bundle-ClassPath: cmap_core.jar, libs/WMFWriter.jar, libs/xstream-1.1.3.jar Bundle-Version: 1.0.65 Eclipse-LazyStart: true Require-Bundle: org.mwc.cmap.legacy, org.mwc.debrief.legacy, org.eclipse.ui, org.eclipse.core.runtime, org.eclipse.core.resources, org.eclipse.ui.views

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.name
property.value: Track Tote Plug-in

instructions.instruction: Bundle-ManifestVersion: 2 Require-Bundle: org.eclipse.ui,org.eclipse.core.runtime,org.mwc.cmap.core,org.mwc.cmap.legacy,org.mwc.debrief.legacy,org.mwc.debrief.core,org.eclipse.ui.views Bundle-Activator: org.mwc.cmap.tote.TotePlugin Manifest-Version: 1.0 Bundle-Version: 1.0.10 Bundle-SymbolicName: org.mwc.cmap.tote; singleton:=true Bundle-ClassPath: tote.jar Bundle-Name: Track Tote Plug-in Bundle-Vendor: MWC Eclipse-LazyStart: true

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.72] Ditch old track representation [1.0.71] Fix cutting layers [1.0.70] Handle xy-plot problem where we don't have time-stepper assigned [1.0.69] Ditch generics [1.0.68] Arbitrary build [1.0.67] Allow right-click edit of multiple items [1.0.66] Switch MWC_Legacy project to use OSGI manifest to export visible elements [1.0.65] Better trapping of error for mouse cursor when plot not selected [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement [1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.5] Include some track data [1.0.3] Amend online update location [1.0.2] Start exporting world & etopo datasets Static data used in Debrief-type projects (Etopo, World Outline, Jre installation)

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.11] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.10] Catch intermittent error on load of new plot [1.0.9] Amend online update location [1.0.8] Ensure write-WMF finishes, improve error reporting [1.0.7] Improve clipping for wrapped bearing points [1.0.6] Better time steps, 30 deg axis steps, remove print button [1.0.5] Adjust plot formatting tick units [1.0.4] Fix bug where menu never shown [1.0.3] Use tidy icon for XYPlot [1.0.2] Sort out xyplot Manifest [1.0.1] Preps for RC1

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.24] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.23] Continue bislider management [1.0.22] Better bislider management [1.0.21] Remember the bi-slider values [1.0.20] Fix the fix [1.0.19] Improve detailed edit of start/end times [1.0.18]Switch icon to more intuitive one [1.0.17] Ditch the preferences pages, we don't need them. [1.0.16] Make sure we finish step tidily, even if probs occur. Then we will carry on stepping [1.0.15] More robust checking for gui elements disposed [1.0.14] More error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.13] Error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.12] Fix edit prop's not being displayed, better default DTG format [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Lots of tidying, introduce highlighters [1.0.9] Redraw whole plot when switching out of relative mode [1.0.8] Include debug monitoring of steps [1.0.7] Allow stepper to work even when outside visible time period [1.0.6] Investigate when time stepper fails [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.3] Preps for RC5 [1.0.2] Remove junit dependency CMAP Time Controller This view controls the time for temporal datasets. Buttons are provided for forward and backward travel, as is a time-slider. The time-format used to display the current date-time is configurable via the Windows-Preferences dialog.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.24] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.23] Continue bislider management [1.0.22] Better bislider management [1.0.21] Remember the bi-slider values [1.0.20] Fix the fix [1.0.19] Improve detailed edit of start/end times [1.0.18]Switch icon to more intuitive one [1.0.17] Ditch the preferences pages, we don't need them. [1.0.16] Make sure we finish step tidily, even if probs occur. Then we will carry on stepping [1.0.15] More robust checking for gui elements disposed [1.0.14] More error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.13] Error trapping for when no time data loaded (new plot) [1.0.12] Fix edit prop's not being displayed, better default DTG format [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Lots of tidying, introduce highlighters [1.0.9] Redraw whole plot when switching out of relative mode [1.0.8] Include debug monitoring of steps [1.0.7] Allow stepper to work even when outside visible time period [1.0.6] Investigate when time stepper fails [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.3] Preps for RC5 [1.0.2] Remove junit dependency CMAP Time Controller This view controls the time for temporal datasets. Buttons are provided for forward and backward travel, as is a time-slider. The time-format used to display the current date-time is configurable via the Windows-Preferences dialog.

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.16] Don't put shapes into Tote [1.0.15] Fix cutting layers [1.0.14] Fix generics-related warnings [1.0.13] Improve context-sensitive help [1.0.12] Correct label for sync with plot [1.0.11] Amend online update location [1.0.10] Sort tactical items by DTG, others by name [1.0.9] Sort layer manager items alphabetically [1.0.8] Tidily fall-over when LayerMgr does not have trackDataListener [1.0.7] Update build [1.0.6] Release preps [1.0.5] Double-click to open item in props window [1.0.4] Context-sensitive primary & secondary buttons [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.1] Provide management of primary/secondary tracks

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.11] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.10] Catch intermittent error on load of new plot [1.0.9] Amend online update location [1.0.8] Ensure write-WMF finishes, improve error reporting [1.0.7] Improve clipping for wrapped bearing points [1.0.6] Better time steps, 30 deg axis steps, remove print button [1.0.5] Adjust plot formatting tick units [1.0.4] Fix bug where menu never shown [1.0.3] Use tidy icon for XYPlot [1.0.2] Sort out xyplot Manifest [1.0.1] Preps for RC1

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.72] Ditch old track representation [1.0.71] Fix cutting layers [1.0.70] Handle xy-plot problem where we don't have time-stepper assigned [1.0.69] Ditch generics [1.0.68] Arbitrary build [1.0.67] Allow right-click edit of multiple items [1.0.66] Switch MWC_Legacy project to use OSGI manifest to export visible elements [1.0.65] Better trapping of error for mouse cursor when plot not selected [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement [1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.value: [1.0.10] Update to JDK1.6 [1.0.9] Add help link [1.0.8] Amend online update location [1.0.7] Fix minor auto-generate problem [1.0.6] Handle tote items being removed from layer manager [1.0.5] Preps for final release [1.0.4] Add user-selectable slant-range property [1.0.3] Preps for RC1 [1.0.2] Incorporate removing primary/secondary tracks

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.73] Syntax checking fixes in legacy code [1.0.72] Ditch old track representation [1.0.71] Fix cutting layers [1.0.70] Handle xy-plot problem where we don't have time-stepper assigned [1.0.69] Ditch generics [1.0.68] Arbitrary build [1.0.67] Allow right-click edit of multiple items [1.0.66] Switch MWC_Legacy project to use OSGI manifest to export visible elements [1.0.65] Better trapping of error for mouse cursor when plot not selected [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement [1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options

property.name: org.eclipse.equinox.p2.description
property.value: [1.0.73] Syntax checking fixes in legacy code [1.0.72] Ditch old track representation [1.0.71] Fix cutting layers [1.0.70] Handle xy-plot problem where we don't have time-stepper assigned [1.0.69] Ditch generics [1.0.68] Arbitrary build [1.0.67] Allow right-click edit of multiple items [1.0.66] Switch MWC_Legacy project to use OSGI manifest to export visible elements [1.0.65] Better trapping of error for mouse cursor when plot not selected [1.0.64] Improve support for range from perpendicular measurement [1.0.63] Force rebuild [1.0.62] Load plot spokes property when reading in saved Arc [1.0.61] Don't zoom out at start/end of pan operation [1.0.60] Don't show narratives in right click popup [1.0.59] Reliable cycle through PartMonitor items in order [1.0.58] Correct list of available line styles [1.0.57] Scale wmf text up a little (30%) [1.0.56] Fix using legacy polyline plotter from new signature [1.0.55] Refactor narrative provider class [1.0.54] Another icon - for the narrative viewer [1.0.53] Incorporate icon for new narrative viewer [1.0.52] Refactor support for legacy narrative viewer [1.0.51] Optimised plotting of polylines [1.0.50] Increase access to prefs. Persist last measured range bearing [1.0.49] Prevent having to double-click "see my props" for relevant props to open [1.0.48] Fix for auto-generating when we only had primary on tote [1.0.47] Fix label location for polygon & other shapes [1.0.46] Fix track export [1.0.45] Reinstate degree symbol for lat/long display [1.0.44] Extended support for generic language changes [1.0.42] Fix for CoastLine painter not loading coastline, duh. [1.0.41] Load Layer from xml even if empty, minor tidying for unit tests [1.0.40] Improved support for context-sensitive help [1.0.39] Overcome export-to-clipboard performance bottleneck [1.0.38] Select parent view before displaying its editable parts in properties window [1.0.37] Hide S57 importer, leading to instability [1.0.36] Plot VPF layers in the correct order [1.0.35] Force updates of S57 libraries [1.0.34] Make sure S57 libraries included [1.0.33] Fix for multiple lat-long trackers, include rudimentary S57 import [1.0.32] Don't try to load java clipboard file [1.0.31] Fix tracking status of lat/long display panel [1.0.30] Increment version num to force update [1.0.29] Prevent lat-long display panel from dissappearing [1.0.28] Amend online update location [1.0.27] Shrink default font size to 9 pixels [1.0.26] Tidying to bounded integer editor [1.0.25] Let tote handle tracks being deleted from layer manager [1.0.24] Show plural units in scale [1.0.23] Fix how centred text appears in labels [1.0.22] Allow user to select line-styles for shapes [1.0.21] Improvements to xy plotting (inc default date ticks) [1.0.20] Assorted Dave W fixes [1.0.19] Handle storing changed Time-Controller properties [1.0.18] Only update relevant layer on plot [1.0.17] Handle plotting zero-length text labels [1.0.16] Prevent white plot objects from dissappearing [1.0.15] Correct layout of multi-line comments [1.0.14] Correct placement of DTG labels on tracks [1.0.13] Release preps [1.0.12] Include definition of overview chart, ability to paste Locations into path editor [1.0.11] Include x-stream library (for xy-plot) [1.0.10] Include Debrief legacy content [1.0.9] Preps for RC1 [1.0.8] Property editing [1.0.7] Better support for primary/secondary tracks [1.0.6] Add more libs [1.0.5] Don't include all legacy MWC sources [1.0.4] Update Legacy VPF importer [1.0.3] Include essential support libraries [1.0.2] Add Etopo/VPF Plotting, together with config options
